name: GET_suppression-invalid_emails
description: **This endpoint allows you to retrieve a list of all invalid email addresses.**

start_time.description: Refers start of the time range in unix timestamp when an invalid email was created (inclusive).

end_time.description: Refers end of the time range in unix timestamp when an invalid email was created (inclusive).

limit.description: Limit the number of results to be displayed per page.

offset.description: Paging offset. The point in the list to begin displaying results.

on-behalf-of.default: The subuser's username. This header generates the API call as if the subuser account was making the call.

$block: The list of invalid email addresses.

$ul: **created**: A Unix timestamp indicating when the email address was added to the invalid emails list.
**email**: The email address that was marked as invalid.
**reason**: The reason that the email address was marked as invalid.
